original_text: Then Moses heard the people weep throughout their families, every man in the door of his tent: and the anger of the Lord was kindled greatly; Moses also was displeased.
korean_text: 백성의 온 종족들이 각기 자기 장막 문에서 우는 것을 모세가 들으니라 이러므로 여호와의 진노가 심히 크고 모세도 기뻐하지 아니하여

sentences.original_text: Then Moses heard the people weep
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 모세가 백성이 우는 것을 들었으니

sentences.original_text: every man in the door of his tent
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람이 자기 장막 문에서 우니

sentences.original_text: and the anger of the Lord was kindled greatly
